name: kexp-doubleplay-backend
description: KEXP Double Play Scanner Backend API

scripts.compile: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64-musl --outfile=dist/kexp-doubleplay-backend-arm64 src/index.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64-musl --outfile=dist/kexp-doubleplay-backend-amd64 src/index.ts
scripts.docker:build: bun run compile && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t geoffreychallen/api-kexpdoubleplays-org .
scripts.docker:run: bun run docker:build && docker run --rm -it --env-file .env -p ${API_PORT:-3000}:3000 -v $(pwd)/data:/app/data -v $(pwd)/logs:/app/logs -v $(pwd)/backups:/app/backups geoffreychallen/api-kexpdoubleplays-org
scripts.docker:push: bun run compile && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t geoffreychallen/api-kexpdoubleplays-org --push .
